metadata.synopsis: Zarys has allowed the player to enter the Zhentarim hideout - either because we won her trust or she needs our help finding her missing agents.

3.speaker: Zarys
3.text: You're a friend of the Zhent now - that's worth something in Baldur's Gate.
3.context: NodeContext: Wryly amused, sizing us up - we made some powerful friends in helping her.

21.speaker: Zarys
21.text: Assuming we make it back there in one piece.
21.context: NodeContext: Sardonic, considering the dangerous path ahead.

7.speaker: Zarys
7.text: Yeah? Got business to conduct, so if you ain't helping you can toddle off.
7.context: NodeContext: Disinterested - we refused to take on a job for her and so she has no use for us.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I've changed my mind. I'll take the job.
19.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us - we've gone from useless to useful in her eyes.

17.speaker: Zarys
17.text: Looks like we can be friends after all.
17.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us - we've gone from useless to useful in her eyes.

139.speaker: Zarys
139.text: Backtrack along the road to the east. They were travelling with a wagon.
139.context: NodeContext: Short, terse - a commander briefing a subordinate who will obey

81.speaker: Zarys
81.text: Some of our people are missing - more importantly, so is their cargo. They were in a caravan coming from the east.
81.context: NodeContext: Grim - we're getting to the heart of the matter. She's fairly unflappable but this job is extremely important.

6.speaker: Zarys
6.text: Bring them back alive if you can. Failing that, get me that shipment. Unopened.
6.context: NodeContext: Giving orders, conveying grim urgency.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I have news of your missing people.
9.context: NodeContext: Expectant - there's no reason for us not to be getting to the point.

67.speaker: Zarys
67.context: NodeContext: Expectant - there's no reason for us not to be getting to the point.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I have news of your missing people.

24.speaker: Zarys
24.context: NodeContext: Straight to the point - when last we spoke she gave us a job, and that's all she's interested in.

38.speaker: Player
38.context: NodeContext: We've given her bad news, but her mens' lives are secondary to her actual goal - she's most urgent about the shipment

18.speaker: Player
18.text: I'm afraid they won't coming back.
18.context: NodeContext: We've given her bad news, but her mens' lives are secondary to her actual goal - she's most urgent about the shipment

131.speaker: Zarys
131.text: Gods damn it. What about the shipment?
131.context: NodeContext: We've given her bad news, but her mens' lives are secondary to her actual goal - she's most urgent about the shipment

93.speaker: Player
93.context: InternalNodeContext: Only visible if unopened chest is in inventory.

88.speaker: Zarys
88.text: Beshaba's black bones, you did it!
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: She takes the chestInternalNodeContext: Player gets rewardNodeContext: Actual surprise and relief - her survival depends on this shipment and we've recovered it.

68.speaker: Zarys
68.text: And still sealed? You're a godsdamned wonder. Here's your coin.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over money to player. InternalNodeContext: Chest situation resolved. NodeContext: Checking the box, relieved and impressed that we've finished the job perfectly.

94.speaker: Zarys
94.text: Actual professionals are rare - you ever want more work, come see me in the Gate.
94.context: NodeContext: She looks on us as an equal - she usually views those she works with as messy or inferior.

90.speaker: Player
90.context: InternalNodeContext: Only visible if player has opened chest in inventory.

59.speaker: Zarys
59.text: Beshaba's black bones, you bloody found it. Funny thing, though - I swear I told you not to open it.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes the chest, hefts it NodeContext: First half is surprise and relief that we completed a crucial job - second half is her taking on irrevocable edge after realising we've broken the terms of the deal, though - and now she has to kill us.

91.speaker: Zarys
91.text: Couldn't you just be a professional? Do as you're told, no questions asked? Like so:
91.context: NodeContext: Grim, frustrated - why can't anyone around her just to their job properly. The 'like so' is her about to order her men to kill us, demonstrating how one follows orders.

101.speaker: Zarys
101.context: InternalNodeContext: Starts combat NodeContext: Louder, leads to violence.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Give her the flask you found inside the chest.
23.context: NodeContext: Mute, neutral - she's not surprised by much, but opening this shipment means we've killed her and all her men.

98.speaker: Zarys
98.context: NodeContext: Mute, neutral - she's not surprised by much, but opening this shipment means we've killed her and all her men.

100.speaker: Zarys
100.text: You've killed me. You've bloody killed us all. Damned if I won't return the favour.
100.context: NodeContext: Beat between sentences. Grim towards the end, deciding she's going to take us down with her.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: I had your cargo, but I lost it.
117.context: InternalNodeContext: Only visible if player had chest or flask in inventory and no longer does.

29.speaker: Zarys
29.text: You... lost it. Funny, that - you just lost a heap of coin too.
29.context: NodeContext: Repeating as if she doesn't quite understand. Then emphasising to us just how serious this is, frustrated we've come back looking for a reward for a job we half-assed.

97.speaker: Zarys
97.text: Actually, hells with this - the day I've had? You just lost your life too.
97.context: NodeContext: Gives up trying to contain her anger at how badly we've messed up the job.

76.speaker: Player
76.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has never interacted with chest. Enables 14fedd62-c2e7-8d4a-4b01-f5c557cb4f53

56.speaker: Zarys
56.text: Good. Reckon you won't find it here, though.
56.context: NodeContext: Blunt, disinterested - if we haven't found what she needs, she's not interested.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: I saved them. They'll be along soon.
99.context: NodeContext: Neutral - not unfriendly but we're telling her something too good to be true and until she sees evidence she's not interested in dealing with us

130.speaker: Zarys
130.text: Then I'm much obliged - or I will be, once I see them and their cargo.
130.context: NodeContext: Neutral - not unfriendly but we're telling her something too good to be true and until she sees evidence she's not interested in dealing with us

28.speaker: Player
28.text: I saved Rugan. He'll be along soon.
28.context: NodeContext: Neutral - not unfriendly but we're telling her something too good to be true and until she sees evidence she's not interested in dealing with us

115.speaker: Zarys
115.text: Then I'm in your debt - or will be, once I see him and his cargo.
115.context: NodeContext: Neutral - not unfriendly but we're telling her something too good to be true and until she sees evidence she's not interested in dealing with us

66.speaker: Zarys
66.text: Didn't think you'd get your coin based on spinning some tale, did you?
66.context: NodeContext: Vaguely chiding - we told her we'd do a job, and she's not going to be giviing us a penny until we complete it.

37.speaker: Zarys
37.text: Well I'll give you a hint, shall I? They ain't down here. On your way.

34.speaker: Zarys
34.text: I was glad to see Rugan, until he told me he lost the shipment.
34.context: NodeContext: Wry, vaguely amused, considering us - we impressed her enough that she recruited us instead of killing us, but we still have a job to do.

30.speaker: Zarys
30.text: Failure creates debt. And debt requires payment. But he'll live.

44.speaker: Zarys
44.text: Welcome to the family. Don't get comfortable - that shipment's wanted in Baldur's Gate.
44.context: NodeContext: Wry, vaguely amused, considering us - we impressed her enough that she recruited us instead of killing us, but we still have a job to do.

45.speaker: Zarys
45.text: Not many can talk their way into a Zhentarim outpost.
45.context: NodeContext: Making an offer, feeling us out

128.speaker: Zarys
128.text: I could use someone with your skills. Interested in a job?
128.context: NodeContext: Making an offer, feeling us out

127.speaker: Player
127.text: I'd rather know who I'd be working for first - the Zhentarim?
127.context: NodeContext: Not a boast - just a simple statement of fact.

89.speaker: Zarys
89.text: We're the finest mercenaries on the Coast.
89.context: NodeContext: Not a boast - just a simple statement of fact.

129.speaker: Zarys
129.text: We can provide you with anything - for a price.
129.context: NodeContext: Again, not boastful - just a statement of fact. They're merchants who have no scruples about what they sell or who to.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: Wait, so what are you: merchants or mercenaries?
132.context: NodeContext: Stating it simply - her group are mercenaries, there's nothing complicated about it

46.speaker: Zarys
46.text: If you've got coin to spend and problems to solve, the Zhent will relieve you of both.
46.context: NodeContext: Stating it simply - her group are mercenaries, there's nothing complicated about it

57.speaker: Zarys
57.text: But today I'm offering work, not looking for it.
57.context: NodeContext: Bringing us back to the topic at hand, no longer interested in indulging our curiosity

26.speaker: Player
26.context: NodeContext: Scornful of our moral objections - she's offering us a simple job

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Doesn't sound like a group I want to get involved with.
113.context: NodeContext: Scornful of our moral objections - she's offering us a simple job

140.speaker: Zarys
140.text: It's gold I'm offering, not a marriage bond.
140.context: NodeContext: Scornful of our moral objections - she's offering us a simple job

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Lot of explosives. Planning a war?
62.context: NodeContext: Speaking about something distasteful - their operation was running smoothly until another organisation ruined it for them.

138.speaker: Zarys
138.text: Cleaning up. We had a steady operation going here.
138.context: NodeContext: Speaking about something distasteful - their operation was running smoothly until another organisation ruined it for them.

20.speaker: Zarys
20.text: Then someone kidnapped a duke - right on our bloody doorstep.
20.context: NodeContext: Vague disgust - she sees herself as a professional, and is disdainful of those who can't run similarly efficient operations.

105.speaker: Zarys
105.text: The Flaming Fist will want someone to blame, and I don't plan to leave anything pointing our way.
105.context: NodeContext: She's disdainful of the Flaming Fist, a rival organisation known for corruption and inefficiency.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: The Fist already know you're here. They just don't care.
118.context: NodeContext: Dismissing our point - she has more experience in these matters than we do.

74.speaker: Zarys
74.text: Maybe not now, no. But that'll change once the council gets involved. They'll want heads to roll.
74.context: NodeContext: Dismissing our point - she has more experience in these matters than we do.

80.speaker: Zarys
80.text: We're getting out - just one last loose end to take care of. Help me and I'll make it worth your while.
80.context: NodeContext: Firm - the matter is settled, so are we going to be useful to her or not?

58.speaker: Player
58.text: I don't want to get caught up in any of this.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: This job you mentioned - what's involved?

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Good luck with that. I don't want to get involved.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: A job? You were ready to kill me a moment ago.
31.context: NodeContext: Shrugging, unconcerned - she's ready to kill anyone at any moment, it's not personal.

36.speaker: Zarys
36.text: Still am, as it goes. Take it as a mark of respect.
36.context: NodeContext: Shrugging, unconcerned - she's ready to kill anyone at any moment, it's not personal.

39.speaker: Zarys
39.text: But right now, I reckon we're better off friends than enemies. You interested or not?
39.context: NodeContext: Getting back on track, not interested in our concerns - just the job at hand.

137.speaker: Player
137.context: NodeContext: Grim - we're getting to the heart of the matter. She's fairly unflappable but this job is extremely important.

40.speaker: Zarys
40.text: Some of our people are missing - more importantly, so is their cargo.
40.context: NodeContext: Grim - we're getting to the heart of the matter. She's fairly unflappable but this job is extremely important.

75.speaker: Zarys
75.text: Find them. Keep them alive if you can. Failing that, just bring that shipment back. Unopened.
75.context: NodeContext: Giving orders, conveying grim urgency.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I already found them. They're dead.
47.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at our probing - she's offering us a job for a lot of money, and that's all we need to know.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I found a pair that sound like your men - being swarmed by gnolls.
32.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at our probing - she's offering us a job for a lot of money, and that's all we need to know.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: What's so important about this cargo?
61.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at our probing - she's offering us a job for a lot of money, and that's all we need to know.

109.speaker: Zarys
109.text: I'm offering hard coin, not idle answers.
109.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at our probing - she's offering us a job for a lot of money, and that's all we need to know.

22.speaker: Zarys
22.text: All you need to know is that I'm willing to pay a hideous sum to get it back - unopened.
22.context: NodeContext: Laying the job out very clearly, not going to be pushed into any more detail

133.speaker: Player
133.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - and immediately down to business.

125.speaker: Zarys
125.text: Good. Backtrack along the road to the east and look for a wagon. Bodies. The usual.
125.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - and immediately down to business.

33.speaker: Zarys
33.text: Time was, no one dared touch a caravan bearing our colours.
33.context: NodeContext: Stating how notorious her group is, how serious it is that someone attacked a shipment

35.speaker: Zarys
35.text: Find whoever did this and remind them why.
35.context: NodeContext: Grim - giving us permission to hurt whoever hurt her group.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Sounds shady. I'd rather not get involved.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I'm just here to trade - I have my own concerns.
55.context: NodeContext: Skeptical that our goals are any more important or lucrative than the job she's offering.

85.speaker: Zarys
85.text: And making a small fortune ain't one of them?
85.context: NodeContext: Skeptical that our goals are any more important or lucrative than the job she's offering.

16.speaker: Zarys
16.text: Spend your coin and be on your way. But be quick about it - we're blowing this place soon.
16.context: NodeContext: Shrugging - we can suit ourselves but if we're not going to be of use, we can do whatever trading we want and get out.

49.speaker: Zarys
49.text: What're you jawing at me for, recruit? You've got work to do.
49.context: NodeContext: Expectant - she spared our life so we could carry out an important task for her. So why aren't we doing it?

53.speaker: Zarys
53.text: You've already brought me bad news - tell me you've got something better this time.
53.context: NodeContext: When last we spoke we told her her men were dead - but she's more concerned with the shipment that was with them. She's waiting on word from us.

64.speaker: Zarys
64.text: I owe you one for saving my people. The Zhentarim look out for their own - even if it's Rugan.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

108.speaker: Zarys
108.text: I owe you one for saving my people. The Zhentarim look out for their own - even if it's Rugan.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

110.speaker: Zarys
110.text: I owe you one for saving my people. The Zhentarim look out for their own - even if it's Rugan.
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

106.speaker: Zarys
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

87.speaker: Zarys
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

124.speaker: Zarys
124.text: Pity we didn't have you on the job from the start.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: What makes that cargo so important?

111.speaker: Zarys
111.text: You did me a service - doesn't make you one of us.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Rubble? What are you planning to do?

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Rubble? What are you planning to do?

123.speaker: Zarys
123.text: Someone kidnapped a duke - right on our bloody doorstep. The Flaming Fist will need someone to blame.

41.speaker: Zarys
41.text: I don't plan on it being us.

86.speaker: Zarys
86.text: Our trader can show you some of our more exotic items, now - but don't delay. This place is likely to be rubble soon.

0.speaker: Zarys
0.text: That's worth some coin. And my thanks.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

112.speaker: Zarys
112.text: That's worth some coin. And my thanks.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.
